description:
This is the free version of my full, 52-lecture tutorial course on Native Instruments' "Massive". It is a great introduction to the software. If you like it, you might want to check out the full version on my course page.

--

This course is a comprehensive training course in the popular and powerful "Massive" VST plug-in from Native Instruments. Using 100% high-definition screencasts, you will learn the ins and outs of this software. It is the free (lite) version of my full course on Massive.

I created this course because learning the principles of true sound design opened up a world of possibilities for my productions. Massive helped get me there. Now I want to show you how to get there too.

You know that you're sick of being a preset-picker. Learn sound design and get over that production plateau that has been making you hate your mediocre mixes.

You will become a master of Massive.
title: Massive Tutorial: Master "Massive" In One Week (Lite)
